Catalano.Imaging.Tools

Class IntegralImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Tools.IntegralImage

  • public class IntegralImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Integral Image.
    The class implements integral image concept, which is described by Viola and Jones in: P. Viola and M. J. Jones, "Robust real-time face detection", Int. Journal of Computer Vision 57(2), pp. 137â€“154, 2004. An integral image I of an input image G is defined as the image in which the intensity at a pixel position is equal to the sum of the intensities of all the pixels above and to the left of that position in the original image.

      Provides access to internal array keeping integral image data.
